description: A shell script used for process monitoring (pmon) that manages registration, unregistration, setting, and unsetting of processes to be monitored, and performs process checks to ensure they are running, restarting them if necessary.

methods.name: do_check_process
methods.description: Checks system uptime and monitored processes, restarting any that are not running.

methods.name: do_register
methods.description: Registers a new process feature to be monitored.

methods.name: do_unregister
methods.description: Unregisters a process feature from being monitored.

methods.name: do_setproc
methods.description: Sets process details (name, pidfile, restart command) for a feature to be monitored.

methods.name: do_unsetproc
methods.description: Removes process details for a feature, stopping its monitoring.
